doc.title: The Young Indiana Jones Chronicles

credit.role: Very Big Man - Ministery of Telephones

doc.plot: The now legendary, almost mythical character of Indiana Jones once had a childhood. Every episode starts out with the elderly man that he is in the 1990's getting into a specific situation where he has to tell a story from his past. The stories go back to when he was ten years old and on a world tour with his father, and to his late-teens when he fought in World War I.
